name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in high-performance software solutions, particularly with expertise in **React**. Adept at developing user-centric interfaces, while fostering effective **teamwork** and **communication** skills to lead collaborative projects. Proficient in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, with a solid foundation in **Java** and **Kotlin** to support diverse development needs. Experienced in the full development lifecycle, having contributed significantly to projects that utilize **message brokers**, ensuring efficient message handling and scalability.
Possesses a strong technical background with hands-on expertise in **Python**, **Flutter**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Committed to building secure, maintainable systems that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while showing passion for developing applications that leverage **AI/ML capabilities** for enhanced analytics and decision-making. Proven ability to deliver through innovative cloud-native deployments on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a focus on agile development practices.
